name: CategoryTheory.Limits.closedUnderLimitsOfShape_of_limit
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
J : Type w
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{w', w} J
P : C → Prop
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
h : ∀ {F : CategoryTheory.Functor J C} [inst : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimit F], (∀ (j : J), P (F.obj j)) → P (CategoryTheory.Limits.limit F)
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape J P
decl:
theorem closedUnderLimitsOfShape_of_limit [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P]
    (h : ∀ {F : J ⥤ C} [HasLimit F], (∀ j, P (F.obj j)) → P (limit F)) :
    ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape J P := by
  intros F c hc hF
  have : HasLimit F := ⟨_, hc⟩
  exact mem_of_iso P ((limit.isLimit _).conePointUniqueUpToIso hc) (h hF)

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.closedUnderColimitsOfShape_of_colimit
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
J : Type w
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{w', w} J
P : C → Prop
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
h : ∀ {F : CategoryTheory.Functor J C} [inst : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimit F], (∀ (j : J), P (F.obj j)) → P (CategoryTheory.Limits.colimit F)
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.ClosedUnderColimitsOfShape J P
decl:
theorem closedUnderColimitsOfShape_of_colimit [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P]
    (h : ∀ {F : J ⥤ C} [HasColimit F], (∀ j, P (F.obj j)) → P (colimit F)) :
    ClosedUnderColimitsOfShape J P := by
  intros F c hc hF
  have : HasColimit F := ⟨_, hc⟩
  exact mem_of_iso P ((colimit.isColimit _).coconePointUniqueUpToIso hc) (h hF)

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape.limit
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
J : Type w
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{w', w} J
P : C → Prop
h : CategoryTheory.Limits.ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape J P
F : CategoryTheory.Functor J C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimit F
a✝ : ∀ (j : J), P (F.obj j)
⊢ P (CategoryTheory.Limits.limit F)
decl:
theorem ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape.limit (h : ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape J P) {F : J ⥤ C} [HasLimit F] :
    (∀ j, P (F.obj j)) → P (limit F) :=
  h (limit.isLimit _)

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimit F
a✝ : ∀ (j : J), P (F.obj j)
⊢ P (CategoryTheory.Limits.colimit F)

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.hasLimit_of_closedUnderLimits
initialProofState:
J : Type w
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{w', w} J
C : Type u
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
P : C → Prop
h : CategoryTheory.Limits.ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape J P
F : CategoryTheory.Functor J (CategoryTheory.FullSubcategory P)
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimit (F.comp (CategoryTheory.fullSubcategoryInclusion P))
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimit F
decl:
theorem hasLimit_of_closedUnderLimits (h : ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape J P)
    (F : J ⥤ FullSubcategory P) [HasLimit (F ⋙ fullSubcategoryInclusion P)] : HasLimit F :=
  have : CreatesLimit F (fullSubcategoryInclusion P) :=
    createsLimitFullSubcategoryInclusionOfClosed h F
  hasLimit_of_created F (fullSubcategoryInclusion P)

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J C
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J (CategoryTheory.FullSubcategory P)

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimit (F.comp (CategoryTheory.fullSubcategoryInclusion P))

decl:

    (F : J ⥤ FullSubcategory P) [HasColimit (F ⋙ fullSubcategoryInclusion P)] : HasColimit F :=

  hasColimit_of_created F (fullSubcategoryInclusion P)

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.hasColimitsOfShape_of_closedUnderColimits
initialProofState:
